entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow at times early this evening. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 27.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 27. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 27. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near minus 27. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Thursday 02 March 2023
